Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very tasty bagels, good coffee and a lot of space. I particularly liked the seating area close to the window that gets a lot of sunlight.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice, relaxed atmosphere. We had the tapas platter with 2 bagels, very good. Several vegan options as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice and quite place. Great to work. Good selection of food and drinks. Creative menu. The staff is very friendly but could be more customer oriented (slow ordering service despite the fact that I was their only customer and quick request to pay - should be the oposit in my opinion).

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The best place to get a piece of bread with a hole in it. Great food chilled atmosphere

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Quality bagels and coffee. Impressed with the goat cheese. Customer service was on point.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cozy cafe space right next to the public library, with a small cupboard with books and toys for toddlers and children. Nice coffee and things to eat, seems like a good place to do some work on your laptop as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tasty food and friendly staff. Take away is possible, which is handy during lockdown times. The bagels are overpriced compared to their quality.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
As delicious as every other Bagels & Beans!
There are few tables outside, which makes it perfect for a lunch or afternoon snack in the sun when the weather is nice, but it's also very cosy inside. …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Ive been to this bagels & beans for many years and service has always been great and today was the 1st time I was totally ignored and other customers that came in after me were served first. Very disappointing. Decided to leave and order elsewhere..

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Nice place, yummy food and drinks, relaxed warm atmosphere. I recommend it!
Do not recommend for easy fast food.... Friendly and slow motion. Enjoy!

Review Text:

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Breakfast, brunch, lunch & tea ! Always my favourite, with a conscious menu that changes with the season.🌸 Wonderful fairtrade coffee's, smoothes, bagels & cakes☕🌼 oh & of course... Vegan options !! 🤗💚🌱

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: There is always great bagels and coffee. Warm and cosy atmosphere. Always clean tables and friendly staff. Thank you!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lots of healthy options to eat (bagels, obviously). Really good breakfasts, and the place is quite cozy (although you will have to wait for your food, better not going in a rush).

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff, good atmosphere and, above all, wonderful bagles! Ended up going here for breakfast five mornings in a row.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place for breakfast, coffee and chit chat, coffee and work, tasty bagels and nice drinks. Fair prices!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great range of bagels, very filling. Good coffee, friendly service

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice concept acties Amsterdam. Nice place to sit down die breakfast or to grab a bagel. Too bad there's no outside to sit down.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Asked for coffee, got it. It's taste was good as well. 10/10 would go there again

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great Breakfast, service and Price. I have breakfast in this place twice a week.
